meaningMnemonic: There's a little speck of something on your plate (皿). "What is that?" you ask. Oh no... that speck is <radical>BLOOD</radical>!!! I hope it's blood from a nosebleed you suddenly have and not someone else's blood. (Your waiter is probably gonna get fired, btw.) At least your platelets should stop the bleeding soon. Haha, get it? PLATE-lets? Japanese blood jokes.
